remarks: The set of ` N ` x ` N ` diagonal matrices over (a ring) ` R ` . (Contributed by AV, 8-Dec-2019.)
statement:
dmatval.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
dmatval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
dmatval.0 $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
dmatval.d $e |- D = ( N DMat R ) $.
dmatval $p |- ( ( N e. Fin /\ R e. V ) -> D = { m e. B | A. i e. N A. j e. N ( i =/= j -> ( i m j ) = .0. ) } ) $.
$d B m $.
$d N i j m $.
$d R i j m $.
